website_summaries.verdict: Nonstick springform pan that fits inside both 6- and 8-quart Instant Pots.
pros: Coating on the pan to prevent sticking meets all guidelines for safe cooking
Includes a larger buckle than normal, which simplifies opening the pan
Fits in Instant Pots to create pot-in-pot meals
cons: A little more expensive than some other options for a single 7" pan

customer_reviews.title: Good Springform Pan.....is it Leakproof?
customer_reviews.text: The main thing people want to know does it leak? Yes and no. It doesn't leak if you get the bottom on the pan into the grove. But it;s a bit difficult to do so, like ALL springform pans. I only use it for cakes....so it could be the thinker the batter the harder it is to leak. No one will use their pan for water. If you line the grooves up right, it shouldn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in 6 qt Instapot
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it leaked but I figured out how to tighten the clasp and hasn't leaked since. Toss it in dishwasher although I think I will hand wash from now on to preserve the finish...
customer_reviews.author: A Fiber Artist

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest the price is what grabbed my attention to purchase this product. The pan was perfect and worked wonders in making cheesecake in the Instant Pot. I was very impressed by the packaging as well. The pan came in a nice durable box. I highly recommend buying products from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: J. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Leaks right through, crap.
customer_reviews.text: This pan leaks, plain and simple. I think I can get away with using it if my base it like a thick crust or something but liquids at the base will leak right out! So I’d keep searching amazon or just go buy one from a store if I were you. Just sayin. Easy to clean because it’s non stick, but the important thing to not is again it leaks, sooo yeah. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Missy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easiest cheesecake ever!
customer_reviews.text: This springform pan is the perfect size for the Instant Pot, and doesn't leave leftovers for days. I've always had trouble with cheesecakes cracking in the oven, but this little pan makes it a snap to bake a perfect cheesecake in the Instant Pot! Super easy cleanup, and ready to bake again!
customer_reviews.author: Netmom

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in my 8qt Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints and highly recommend this pan. I cooked this cheesecake from a recipe I read online, and it was only my second cheesecake ever and came out great; this pan made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baty

customer_reviews.title: Value and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: While the quality is based on price this Springform Pan works well when we bake our cheesecake. You do need to wrap the bottom with foil if you plan on using it in a water bath since it is not completely form fitting and does leak. However, the price is well worth the quality of the pan. We'd buy again if we needed another pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This fits the regular size Instant Pot perfectly. Making cheesecake in the Instant Pot takes some trial and error. I recommend reading everything you can find on line and don't expect to serve your first one to guests. The pan is well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have only had a chance to use my pan once. But it worked perfectly in my Instant Pot. As advertised, it’s a 7” spring pan for the “8” Instant spot opening. I liked it so much I ordered a second one for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Instant pot cheesecakes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for instant pot cheesecakes!! The batter doesn’t leak through the bottom, and it fits so nicely inside the instant pot. Can be tough to get it back out if you don’t have handles for pulling things out of your pot. Cleans up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works and Price
customer_reviews.text: If you want to try a cheesecake in your instant pot...buy this pan; it makes a perfect cake that is easy to use and looks like it came from a bakery. This cleaned easily and we will enjoy using it for years to come. Great price too! Thanks for the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Beware of leakage
customer_reviews.text: This pan leaks! It worked alright for about 10 times in my pressure cooker and then it started to leak and try making potatoes au gratin or cheesecake with all the liquid leaking out of the bottom - frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Howson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the InstaPot
customer_reviews.text: Used this pan twice to make lasagna in my InstaPot. It worked great and the no -stick finish made clean-up very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthea Kotlan

customer_reviews.title: fits into my 8 quart instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I worried that the locking mechanism might be too tight but it fit with enough room to lift the pan out safely. Haven't used it yet but I'm sure it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Instant Pot baking
customer_reviews.text: Got this specifically for baking cheesecake in an Instant Pot and it performed excellently. The pan was easy to use and fit on top of the trivet inside the Instant Pot. Clean up was easy. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: My old spring form pan has done its duty for fifty years. It was time for a decent retirement. this one is of the new non stick generation.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Hill

customer_reviews.title: Made a great cheesecake!
customer_reviews.text: The pan is small but has to be to fit into the instant pot and that is what I bought it for. I made a cheesecake and it turned out great! The pan held a "2 cream cheese" cheesecake without any problems. It was easy to clean up- I can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: mind

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these springform pans commercially for peanut butter pie. They are incredibly easy to use, don't stick or leak, and clean up easily. Great product, I would purchase again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Have no dents or scratches. Looks durable. Haven’t used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: An excellent American made pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! I’ve used it in my Instant Pot to make several dishes already. It’s easy to clean and durable. I’d recommend it to anyone. Best of all, it’s American made!
customer_reviews.author: Janet E. Senatore

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was what I was looking for. Has expanded my cooking with my pressure 2 x over. Wish I would have purchased earlier. Easy to clean so not only does it help me put a meal together fast bur fast clean up
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This is a mini of my cheesecake (springform) pan. Can't wait to make Instant Pot cake and cheesecake!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed/Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this springform pan. I use it primarily to make deserts in my Instant Pot - it fit perfectly in the 6 quart. It is easy to open and close, and nothing sticks to it. I also used in the oven, and it works well. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bmasurat

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in 6.5 qt. Ninja foodi
customer_reviews.text: Made several cakes in the Ninja Foodi. It did not leak, fit perfectly. After using, easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Hank LPD

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I was curious as to the value - since the price was so reasonable. My last 40.00 pan from a high-end retailer broker after 1 use. This pan is just as good and 1/2 the price. I'm pleased with the quality and it's easy to use and DOES NOT leak. Happy Baking!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Aros

customer_reviews.title: So far, working well.
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times so far, and completely leakproof. Unfortunately, I can only make so much instant pot cheesecake in a month. Fingers crossed that it will stay leakproof.
customer_reviews.author: mom of twins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect springform pan for my instant pot. It fits perfectly. It's easy to clean. It works really well. It arrived on time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: rabid reader girl

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: Just got rid of an old pan that leaked and this is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: pkbemmes

customer_reviews.title: Insta-Pot Cheeeeeese Cake Yuuuum!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cheese cake in the insta pot. No leaks. Size is just fine for my 6 QT pot.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in my Instant Pot to make cheese cake. The fit was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: wonderful cheesecake pan for my instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I've made about 4-5 cheesecakes in this. Works flawlessly, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AJoyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pan worked great for my cheesecake! It was easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Simple cleanup. Fit well in my instapot. Liked the flexibility of using with mult size instapots since we actually have more than 1
customer_reviews.author: TxKat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove cake from pan
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, meet my expectation. since purchase I baked twice and the removal of the cheese cake was seamless. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this springform pan to use with my new Ninja Instant Cooker; specifically to make cheesecake. The product arrived as scheduled and appears to be well constructed. It was very easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Gain

customer_reviews.title: Just fits into my IP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this springform to fit into my IP to make cheesecake. It fits great and I'm headed to the kitchen now!
customer_reviews.author: auntiepatch

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This fits our instapot perfectly and is great quality. Great price and great srller
customer_reviews.author: Karin B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with my 8 at. Instant Pot. Couldn't be more satisfied. Allows for easy release and moist cakes and brownies. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pan is as advertised. It expands my recipe repertoire greatly especially long, time favourites.
customer_reviews.text: As an instapot newcomer, initially I limited myself to meat based recipes. With the pan, I have broadened my meal selections including desserts. It is easy to use and easy to clean. I picked it from many being offered almost at random. I am not disappointed. Indeed, it exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Springform Pan
customer_reviews.text: It's a springform pan. It does what springform pans do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great in the 6qt Instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Great for making cheesecake in the instant pot. I have made many with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Chariot

customer_reviews.title: High quality durable pan.  Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I baked a vintage family cheesecake recipe in this pan! I haven’t had one for years when it was lost in a move. It worked wonderfully. High quality. So glad I finally broke down and bought another pan. I kept thinking IT WILL SHOW UP. We enjoyed our cheesecake so much. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Cheesecake in my Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: This little pan is a perfect fit for my Instant Pot, and at only 7" I don't feel too badly if I eat it all in two days. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Doggett

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday present for my daughter- she has not used it yet, but loved it
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Baker
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans I bake all the time now and I'll b ordering more of these soon
customer_reviews.author: Terjuan Reenay Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works fine on my first attempt
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in my onstapot. Made a cheese cake. First attempt. Need some fine tuning on receipe.
customer_reviews.author: william forgie

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: I made cheesecake in my pressure cooker and it turned out perfectly. This pan is sturdy, easy to clean and there were no leaks. I paid less than 10 dollars for it and it was money well spent.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a perfect cheesecake! Easy to remove sides! Easy to clean.

customer_reviews.text: This 7" Bellemain nonstick Springform pan is perfect for cheesecake and other uses. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Great little pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great little pan! I made brownies in the instant pot with it! I also plan to make a raw vegan cheese cake with it soon.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect for the instant pot, which is why we bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life simple
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. I have used it several times since I bought it. This has made cooking so much easier. It's perfect I haven't had any problems at all with it.

customer_reviews.title: A good product with fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition for the pressure cooker. It makes cooking a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Green

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not really pleased with the quality of this pan, it was just okay in a pinch, but first chance I get to find a 7in Wilton springform pan, I will definetly replace this one with it, the quality of the Wilton is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my family was coming to town and my husband wanted me to make a cheesecake for everyone. It worked really well for my cheesecake. The cake did NOT stick to the pan after I baked it. I am very pleased with the pan!
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN C FANT

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan is a nice weight and easy to handle. It’s the perfect size. It arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Broken rivets as soon as I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Should have baked earlier with this so I could return/ replace. The rivets broke the first time I used it, rendering the spring tension mechanism useless. Could be an isolated incident, but I'd spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for instant pot
customer_reviews.text: This product does great for cheesecake in the instant pot. I have used it to make lasagna and there was some leakage of the sauce before cooking. It was as much as other spring form pans I have used.
customer_reviews.author: John Tate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the instant pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan to make desserts in my instant pot. It’s the perfect size for the 6qt. And it’s non-stick so it’s easy to clean! Overall it’s a great deal in price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M. Overby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 6 quart Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed making a very delicious cheesecake in my springform pan by Bellemain. It was easy to use, nonstick and an easy cleanup. I will be using this pan often. Thank you Bellemain for making this available to me at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bistoff

customer_reviews.title: The springform pan is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The new springform pan works perfectly in the instant pot. It makes the right size for our family, is easy to use, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheesecake pan for Instantpot
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. Using in my Instantpot for cheesecakes. Love the easy cleanup.

customer_reviews.title: This springform pan works great every time and great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! I’ve cooked 10 cheesecakes in it so far and a lasagna! I’ve used it on bake and pressure cook in my Ninja Foodi. Excellent pan, easy to clean, latch works great. Excellent quality. Highly recommend this pan.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Worked good a little tedious to clean but that’s it
